description: This file contains the complete PostgreSQL database schema for a music streaming platform, including table definitions, constraints, indexes, functions, triggers, views, and security policies.

methods.name: set_updated_at
methods.description: A trigger function that updates the 'updated_at' timestamp on row modifications.

methods.name: update_daily_stats_on_history_insert
methods.description: A trigger function that updates daily listening statistics when a new listening history record is inserted.
